location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Samuel Manesty and Harford Jones, at Bussora [Basra], to Charles Watkins, East India Company Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a request for the delay in forwarding a letter from the Bombay Presidency to Jaafer Khan [Jaâ€˜far Khan Zand] until the former receives a letter from Basra on the subject. The reasons will be given in time.
